title: CrockPot Pepperoni Chicken
directions: Put chicken on bottom of slow cooker and season with salt and pepper. /p In a medium bowl, stir together chicken broth, tomato paste, Italian Seasoning, Red Pepper flakes, basil, oregano, and diced onion. /p Pour over slow cooker. Add pepperoni and olives. /p Cover and cook for 3 hours on high or 6 hours on low, or until the chicken falls apart and can be easily shredded. /p Shred the chicken, then return to the slow cooker to absorb the juices for up to another hour. /p Serving Size: 1/6 of total yield (about 1 cup) /p Calories 307
